name: S MAB Training Academy
about: S.MAB Training Academy, established in 2011, is a renowned Aviation Training Organization with a decade of experience in providing quality education. Our academy prides itself on excellence, innovation, and a holistic approach to teaching and learning. With highly qualified and experienced facilitators, we offer world-class training in various courses, including the Flight Attendant Course, which has achieved a 100% SACAA pass rate. Our well-equipped training facility and flexible programs ensure the success and personal development of each student. We are committed to excellence and have received positive feedback from our students, who appreciate the individual attention, practical training, and supportive staff. S.MAB Training Academy is dedicated to taking your career to the next level.
services:
["CABIN CREW LICENCE
Cabin Type Rating
Crew Resource Management
Dangerous Goods Categories
Safety and Emergency Procedure Training"]
